hcc_text: Pelham Parkway is in the middle third in the Bronx for pedestrian deaths and serious injuries per mile.
info: At Pelham Parkway at Bx River Parkway Sb En Pelham Parkway and Pelham Parkway Wb, there was 1 severe injury in crashes between 2008 and 2012.
intersection: Pelham Parkway at Bx River Parkway Sb En Pelham Parkway and Pelham Parkway Wb
